data.actual_result: The messages get dragged up a little
data.short_description: Swiping left or right in a fast motion drags the messages up
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel- Click on the channel name. - Click on Pinned Messages- Carefully place your finger on the left side (almost close to the edge, but at least about half of an inch away.)- Swipe right, then try to scroll up and down.
